title: When do clubs begin in Japan? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming you mean “night clubs” they usually open around 9 - 10 but don’t really pick up until about midnight. (bars open much earlier) The real question is: when do clubs END in Japan. I can tell you as a former bartender and club promoter, I’ve worked at several parties that went until 2pm the next day several times!
